attributes.action: Amend prehistoric Easter licensing laws in N.Ireland & Sunday trade limitations
attributes.additional_details: I live in Northern Ireland. Our politicians are too busy arguing over flags & parades.
attributes.background: Remove the stupid Sunday trading limitations that provide nothing but a hindrance to the majority of people in NI. In addition, amend the even more ridiculous Easter licensing legislation which does nothing but harm local businesses within the hospitality sector and the tourism industry as a whole.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible for.

If you'd like to send your petition to the Northern Ireland Assembly, you can find the contact details here:

http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/about-the-assembly/contact-us/
